name: Dragon-Touched
text: Your life has been shaped by an encounter with a powerful dragon, and you have dedicated your life to seeing that dragon dead.
prerequisites: You must have been knocked unconscious in an encounter with a challenging draconic foe or have a regional background tied to a specific dragon (such as those presented in this section or a similar trait).
benefit: Choose one kind of dragon (such as blue, green, or silver). You gain a +2 bonus on Reflex saves against the breath weapons of dragons of the chosen kind, as well as a +1 bonus on attack rolls and a +1 dodge bonus to AC against members of the same dragon kind.
goal: Defeat the specific dragon linked to your prerequisite.
completionBenefit: You gain the ability to select a new dragon kind whenever you wish. You must first defeat a member of the selected kind with a CR equal to or greater than your character level. In addition, you gain a +2 bonus on initiative checks when facing a dragon of your selected kind.
text_zh: 你的生活因为遭遇过某条强大的龙而被改变了，因此你决意献身于毁灭那条龙。
prerequisites_zh: 你必须在一场遭遇中被一个有足够挑战性的龙类敌人被打到不省人事或拥有一个针对某只特别的龙的区域性背景（如本章所述的那些或类似的特性）。
benefit_zh: 选择一种龙（比如蓝龙，绿龙或者银龙）。在对这种龙的喷吐攻击进行反射检定豁免时，获得+2加值，并且在对抗这种龙的所有成员时命中骰上获得+1加值，在防护等级上获得+1闪避加值。
goal_zh: 打败你的先决条件里的那只特定的龙。
completionBenefit_zh: 你可以将这个专长带来的收益扩大到由你决定的另一种龙身上。你必须先击败这一种龙里某个挑战等级等同或高过你的角色等级的成员才能获得这种好处。此外，在面对被你选择过的龙时你在先攻检定上获得+2加值。
